properties.title: How to use the REST API of the CAS Curator
properties.author: Joshua Garcia
Chris Mattmann

section.name: Introduction
section.p: The curator has a REST interface that allows services to be accessed through HTTP requests.
The remainder of this guide is separated into the following sections:

li.a: Retrieving a List of Ingestion Tasks
Creating an Ingestion Task in the Curator Queue

section.name: Retrieving a List of Ingestion Tasks
section.p: A list of ingestion tasks can be retrieved in either json or html format
For example, the URL http://yourhost/curator/services/ingest/list?format=json returns output that looks like:

section.name: Creating an Ingestion Task in the Curator Queue
section.p: An ingestion task can be added to the curator through the REST interface using the following command: http://yourhost/curator/services/ingest/create?files=&numfiles=N&metExtCfgId=something&policy=mls&ptype=

ul.li: yourhost is the host that is running the tomcat server with the curator. For example, your host can be www.mycurator.com
files takes as a value a list of files to be ingested
numfiles takes the number of files to be ingested
metExtCfgId is the num of the metadata extractor to be used. For example, mp3extractor.
ptype takes as a valueis the product type of the files to be ingested. For example, mp3.

section.p:
An example URL is the following:
http://yourhost/curator/services/ingest/create?files=mls%2FMLS-Aura_L2GP-CO_v02-23-c01_2008d107.he5%2Cmls%2FMLS-Aura_L2GP-Temperature_v01-52-c01_2007d055.he5%2Cmls%2FMLS-Aura_L2GP-Temperature_v02-23-c01_2008d110.he5&policy=mls&ptype=he5&numfiles=3&metExtCfgId=odlextractor
The result is the task id for the ingestion task. For example, 2c6df1dc-bfc1-4e22-889e-7b2c262c7db3.

section.name: Starting an Ingestion Task
section.p:
To run the ingestion task, the following URL can be used:
http://yourhost/curator/services/ingest/start?taskId=<task Id>

ul.li: yourhost is the host that is running the tomcat server with the curator. For example, yourhost can be www.mycurator.com
task Id is the task id for the ingestion task. For example, 2c6df1dc-bfc1-4e22-889e-7b2c262c7db3, which was the result of the creation task example of the previous section.
